description: The ex-Nissan boss fled trial in Japan on a private jet that landed in Lebanon on New Year's Eve.
title: Carlos Ghosn: Interpol issues 'red notice' for Nissan ex-boss's arrest
title_page: Carlos Ghosn: Interpol issues 'red notice' for Nissan ex-boss's arrest - BBC News
maintext: Media reports now say he may have legally been in possession of a fourth passport to show his identity on some internal trips within Japan, but it would have been in a locked box or case, and his lawyers would have had the code.
